urls.title: Fauci is sidelined by the White House as he steps up blunt talk on pandemic
urls.description: Trump hasn’t talked to the scientist since early June, saying ‘he’s made a lot of mistakes.'

text: Trump has muzzled the most trusted doctor and scientist in the country. Now they are sending out oppo on him to try and make him look bad. Outrageous. No wonder we lead the world in Covid cases and deaths. And the virus rages on.  https://t.co/aHIpMs2VOI
